summary: Setup Railway deployment configuration for StillLearning platform. Created database setup script, environment configuration files, and deployment documentation. Updated package.json with proper start script, added Railway-specific config files (railway.json, nixpacks.toml), and created comprehensive deployment guide. All files are ready for GitHub push and Railway deployment.
current_status: Railway deployment configuration completed. Ready to push to GitHub repository JForJEN/learning and deploy to Railway with MySQL database service and application service. Database will auto-setup with tables and default admin user on first deployment.
